name: Favonius Codex

refinement_effect.refine_one: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: CRIT hits have a 70% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 10.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: CRIT hits have an 80% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 9s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: CRIT hits have a 90% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 7.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: CRIT hits have a 100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 6s.

description: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.
